title: Battery should be better.....
content:
Here are the refined reviews:

Laptop is very good looking.

Picture quality is excellent and very good.

Fast enough USB ports and a Type-C port are available.

However, there's a significant issue with the battery...

It only provides 2.4 hours of usage, which is truly disappointing.

Acer should take steps to address this battery life concern.

If you're looking for better battery life, I would recommend exploring options from Lenovo or other brands.
